Predicate.Description: If EI.4 (Universal ID Type) contain the value 'EUI-64'.
If OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X' (Case Sensitive).
If OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X' (Case Sensitive).
If RCP-1 (Query Priority) contains the value 'D' (Case Sensitive).

Constraint.Description: EI.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['EUI-64','ISO','URN','L'] (Case Sensitive).
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
EI.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['EUI-64','ISO','URN'] (Case Sensitive).
Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.

MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE' (Case Sensitive).
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'QSB'.

( At least one occurrence of MSH-21.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO' (Case Sensitive). AND At least one occurrence of MSH-21.3 (Universal ID) shall contain the value '1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.6.1.19.1' (Case Sensitive). )
